Content: hey_ i know this is really random_ but am i the only that has been getting this problem that when i play fortnite_ like 15 minutes after it crashes everytime_ if im not the only one_ does anyone know how to fix it?
um i forget_ ill tell you when i get the message tho

it says: we are very sorry that this crash occured. Our goal is to prevent crashes like this occurring in the future. Please help us track down and fix this crash by providing detailed information about what  you were doing so that we may reproduce the crash and fix it quickly. You can also get help at Fortnite Help.Thanks for your help in improving Fortnite
